author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 13-year-old female elephant Jeyamalyatha from the Andal Temple at Srivilliputhur joined the annual rejuvenation camp for temple elephants at Thekkampatti near Mettupalayam on Saturday. It is the 31{+s}{+t}elephant to reach the 48-day camp.

V. Vetriselvan, who is in-charge of the camp, said that Jeyamalyatha joined the camp on the 24{+t}{+h}day as it had to be in the temple for the kumbabishekam about a week ago. Till then, medicines and food supplements were sent to the Andal Temple from the camp.Rameswaram

The elephant from Ramanathaswamy temple in Rameswaram is the only other elephant that is expected to join the camp.
title: One more elephant joins rejuvenation camp
